== FAITeamAgenda ==

This page holds the agenda for the FAITeam, which is working on <nowiki>[[http://www.informatik.uni-koeln.de/fai/|Fully Automatic Installation]]</nowiki>.

This page holds the agenda for the next team meeting. We meet in channel '''#ubuntu-meeting''' on chat.freenode.net. The agenda will include the following:

* Introduction
* status quo a: housekeeping (what has happened now)
* status quo b: current problems with fai in ubuntu
* short term plans for Ubuntu 7.10    (gutsy)
* long  term plans for Ubuntu 8.04LTS (hardy)
* housekeeping (future meetings, communication, launchpad infrastructure etc.)

MootBot is used to help creating summaries: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ScribesTeam/MootBot
